title: Cody Simpson gushes over Miley Cyrus hours after he was heard complaining about her
text:
Cody Simpson has gushed about new girlfriend Miley Cyrus, hours after he was heard complaining about her and saying that she 'won't listen to him.'

The 22-year-old took to his Instagram story on Thursday and shared a picture of the pair together, before describing her as his 'archangel and best mate.'

'Miss you every second,' the Australian singer wrote in his post.

'Miss you every second': Cody Simpson gushed over Miley Cyrus and called her his 'archangel and best mate' on Thursday... hours after he was heard complaining about his new girlfriend and saying she 'won't listen to him'

'Best mate, archangel, miss you every second,' his post began.

'Home tomorrow and so, so glad,' he wrote, with Cody being in Sydney for The Masked Singer Australia, despite being based in Los Angeles.

It comes after he put on a brave face on Thursday night after being overheard complaining about Miley.

Touching: Simpson posted a photo of the couple embracing along with the sweet words

Stepping out: It comes after he put on a brave face on Thursday night after being overheard complaining about Miley. He stepped out in Sydney with sister Alli at a Pandora event in Sydney (pictured)

Support: The Australian singer is seen with his sister Alli at the event

He stepped out in Sydney with sister Alli at a Pandora event in Sydney.

Earlier on Thursday, he was overheard complaining about Miley, 26, at Sydney's Andrew Boy Charlton Pool while on the phone.

'We had a weird one yesterday... not really an argument but she kind of shut down,' Simpson was overheard saying.

Awkward! Earlier on Thursday, he was overheard complaining about Miley, 26, at the Andrew Boy Charlton Pool while on the phone

'Yeah, it was kind of s**tty, but whatever,' he added.

A Speedo-clad Simpson then spoke about the negative response to his new romance from fans in Australia, saying that his fellow countrymen remain loyal to Miley's estranged husband, Liam Hemsworth.

'I'm copping s**t here because of [her] exes. You know, her husband is Australian,' Simpson said, according to an onlooker sitting nearby.

'I'm copping s**t here': A Speedo-clad Simpson then spoke about the negative response to his new romance from fans in Australia, saying that his fellow countrymen remain loyal to Miley's estranged husband, Liam Hemsworth

The onlooker said Simpson spent some time stretching and warming up before getting into the water and swimming a few laps of butterfly.

The Golden Thing hitmaker flew into Sydney on Monday, just hours before he was unmasked as the Robot on the local version of The Masked Singer.

During his subsequent media rounds, he spoke about his blossoming relationship with Cyrus in virtually every TV and radio interview.

Simpson and Cyrus began dating just two months after the American singer announced her separation from Hemsworth, who she married in a private ceremony in December.
description: Cody Simpson has gushed about new girlfriend Miley Cyrus, hours after he was heard complaining about her and saying that she 'won't listen to him.'
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
